response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure seamless integration into your workflow. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss how this product can contribute to your success.", "product_price": 12000}
